description: This pretty village is located in a wonderful rural spot in the beautiful Upper Ceiriog Valley near Wrexham . The scenery around the settlement is really beautiful and there's also the bonus of a historic local pub to visit for rest and refreshment after your exercise. This circular walk from the village uses part of the Upper Ceiriog Trail and other public footpaths to explore the surrounding countryside. The route climbs to a height of over 1440ft with wonderful views over the valley and surrounding hills. You'll also visit the neighbouring village of Tregeiriog which lies just to the east. There's nice views of the River Ceiriog to enjoy here.
